name: COSMIC CROWN (Android)
description:
You find yourself in a narrow corridor, dozens of traps between you and the object of your every desire -- the Cosmic Crown.

A turn-based strategy game with randomly generated levels. You can only move up or down, but the tools at your disposal let you overcome any number of obstacles. As you progress, you and the cosmos changes, introducing new powers to wield and new traps to overcome. And at the end -- the ＣＯＳＭＩＣ ＣＲＯＷＮ

Want to play the game on windows phone or iOS? Or heck, just want to play it for free from the comfort of your cold, immobile, screen that you cannot hold and carress? Online here! (but your support would mean a lot!)
